title: Congratulating the Freeport High School Football Team upon the occasion of capturing the long Island Conference I Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION congratulating the Freeport High School Football
Team and Coach Russ Cellan upon  the  occasion  of  capturing  the  Long
Island Class I Championship

WHEREAS,  Excellence  and  success in competitive sports can be achieved
only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured  by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling  in  them  the  value  of teamwork, encouraging a standard of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS, The Freeport High School Football Team are  the  Long  Island
Class I Champions; on Friday, November 26, 2010, at Hofstra University's
Shuart  Stadium, they won their second straight title by defeating Floyd
High School by a score of 62-35; and
  WHEREAS, The athletic talent displayed by this team is  due  in  great
part  to  the  efforts of Coach Russ Cellan, a skilled and inspirational
tutor, respected for his ability to develop potential  into  excellence;
and
  WHEREAS,  The  team's  overall  record  is  outstanding,  and the team
members were loyally and enthusiastically  supported  by  family,  fans,
friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS, The hallmarks of the Freeport High School Football Team, from
the  opening  game  of  the season to participation in the championship,
were a brotherhood of athletic ability, of good sportsmanship, of  honor
and  of scholarship, demonstrating that these team players are second to
none; and
  WHEREAS, Athletically and academically, the team members  have  proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS,  Coach  Russ Cellan has done a superb job in guiding, molding
and inspiring the team members toward their goals; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment, and Coach Russ Cellan and the  outstanding  athletes  on
the  Freeport High School Football Team have clearly made a contribution
to the spirit of excellence which is a tradition of their  school;  now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate the  Freeport  High  School  Football  Team;  its  members:
Cedric  Smiley,  Eric  Corona, Isaiah Barnes, Jere Brown, Corey Marquez,
Evan Lapier, Karsheen Azeem, Maurice  Irby,  Tesfa  Greenwood,  DeVaughn
Allen,  Aaryn  Dozier,  Errol Small, Brandon Lyons, Jovani Pierre, Chris
Gutierrez, Edgar Cruz, Darrius Tillman, Stephen Baylock,  Craig  Finlay,
Faner  Vargas,  Lashauan  Thomas,  William Brodsky, Emmerick Martin, Ken
Berryhill, Michael  Oquendo,  Charles  Hendricks,  Patrick  Mars,  Edwin
Sandoval,  Meleeh  Streeter,  Jalil Burton, Justin Staton, Dom Albanese,
Chris Sailsman, Greg Foster, Male Lewis, Dorrington Myers, Daniel Olivi-
er, Darien Merriett, Anthony Martinez,  Marquell  Green,  Ken  Urquhart-
Green,  Oscar  Bruce, Robert Morales, Randy Dicks, Phil Stevenson, Derek
Merritt, Jawan Gay, Jeff Williams, Cephas Knighton-Ward, Terrell  Brown,
and  Coach  Russ Cellan; and Assistant Coaches, Kirt Smith, Toby Elmore,
Jimmy Jones, and Matt Cellan on their  outstanding  season  and  overall
team record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  the Freeport High School Football Team and to the aforemen-
tioned coaches.
